author: hiteshraigandhi
body: PowerShell_6.0.0.9-alpha.9-win10-x64.msi is failing to install on my machine. It complains that signature is invalid or corrupt.

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body: I've gotten a message about the untrusted publisher, but it installed successfully.

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
This is taken care of. Release location updated
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v6.0.0-alpha.9

title: PowerShell_6.0.0.9-alpha.9-win10-x64.msi fails to install - signature is invalid or corrupt
